list_definition.definition: a type of small winged insect

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She swatted a fly away with her hand.

list_definition.definition: a fish hook made to look like a fly so that a fish will take it in its mouth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Which fly should I use to catch a trout?

list_definition.definition: a piece of material with buttons or a zip, especially at the front of trousers
to (make something) go through the air on wings etc or in an aeroplane

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The pilot flew (the plane) across the sea.

list_definition.mean_english: (về thời gian) trôi qua rất nhanh
